context: KickAssembler v5.25 Reference Manual by Mads Nielsen - 65xx Cross Assembler with Script Language

splits.reason: Title page, author attribution, and table of contents

splits.name: kickass_introduction
splits.description: KickAssembler introduction and overview - MOS 65xx assembler features, script language capabilities, version history, macros, illegal opcodes, DTV opcodes, pseudo commands, SID file import, graphic format import, Java plugins

splits.name: kickass_getting_started
splits.description: Getting started with KickAssembler - running the assembler with Java, command line usage, example interrupt program with IRQ setup and music playback, KickAss.cfg configuration file, VICE emulator integration

splits.name: kickass_basic_assembler
splits.description: KickAssembler basic assembler functionality - mnemonics syntax, CPU directive for 6502 illegal opcodes DTV 65c02, addressing modes argument types zeropage absolute indirect relative, number formats decimal hex binary, labels multi-labels argument labels, memory directives program counter virtual memory align pseudopc, data directives byte word dword text fill fillword lohifill, encoding screencode petscii ascii, importing source code and binary data, comments, console output print error errorif, breakpoints watches VICE debugging

splits.name: kickass_script_language
splits.description: KickAssembler script language introduction - expressions evaluation, variables constants user-defined labels .var .const .label, scoping curly braces, numeric values integer float operations bitwise operators, parentheses operator precedence, string values concatenation charAt substring length, char values character encoding, Math library sin cos atan2 sqrt abs pow round floor ceil min max random toRadians

splits.name: kickass_branching_looping
splits.description: KickAssembler branching and looping - boolean values true false comparison operators, .if directive conditional assembly, question mark ternary if expressions, .for directive loop counter code generation unrolling, .while directive loops, optimization considerations function mode asm mode performance memory

splits.name: kickass_data_structures
splits.description: KickAssembler data structures - user defined structures .struct directive fields, List values dynamic arrays get set add remove size, working with mutable values .define directive, Hashtable values key-value pairs put get keys containsKey remove

splits.name: kickass_functions_macros
splits.description: KickAssembler functions and macros - .function directive return values parameters, .macro directive code generation parameter passing, pseudo commands .pseudocommand directive custom instructions argument types AT_IMMEDIATE AT_ABSOLUTE AT_ABSOLUTEX AT_ABSOLUTEY AT_NONE CmdArgument, mov16 add16 extended instruction libraries

splits.name: kickass_preprocessor
splits.description: KickAssembler preprocessor - #define directive symbols, #if #elif #else #endif conditional compilation, #import #importif #importonce file inclusion, list of preprocessor directives, boolean operators AND OR NOT

splits.name: kickass_scopes_namespaces
splits.description: KickAssembler scopes and namespaces - scope blocks curly braces variable isolation, .namespace directive hierarchical naming, scoping hierarchy resolution order, namespace directives .filenamespace, escaping current scope with @ operator, label scopes .zp directive, accessing local labels of macros pseudocommands for-loops while-loops if-blocks

splits.name: kickass_segments
splits.description: KickAssembler segments - memory block organization, .segment directive segment switching, output management channeling to files, default segment, naming memory blocks, default memory block, including other segments, including prg files and sid files, boundaries alignment, overlapping memory blocks, segment modifiers virtual, intermediate segments, .segmentout directive, debugger data, segment parameters list

splits.name: kickass_prg_d64_disks
splits.description: KickAssembler PRG files and D64 disk images - .file directive prg output, parameter maps, .disk directive d64 creation, disk parameters name id, file parameters segments prgFiles, custom disk writers Java plugins

splits.name: kickass_import_export
splits.description: KickAssembler import and export - command line arguments passing to script, import binary files LoadBinary, import SID files LoadSid header play init, converting graphics LoadPicture bitmap sprites charset multicolor hires, writing to user defined files createFile, exporting labels to other sourcefiles .sym files, exporting labels to VICE .vs symbol files

splits.name: kickass_modifiers
splits.description: KickAssembler modifiers - .modify directive byte modification before output, encryption packing crunching assembled bytes, Java plugin modifier implementation

splits.name: kickass_special_features
splits.description: KickAssembler special features - source file name and path access, BasicUpstart2 macro basic sys line startup, opcode constants instruction encoding lookup, colour constants C64 color values BLACK WHITE RED CYAN PURPLE GREEN BLUE YELLOW, 3D calculations vector matrix rotation translation perspective projection CmdArgument

splits.name: kickass_assemble_information
splits.description: KickAssembler assemble information - AsmInfo option metadata output, realtime feedback from assembler, AsmInfo file format sections: version libraries directives preprocessor-directives files syntax errors

splits.name: kickass_testing
splits.description: KickAssembler testing - .assert directive expression testing, asserting errors in expressions .asserterror, asserting code blocks byte sequence verification, asserting errors in code blocks, automated test counting

splits.name: kickass_java_plugins
splits.description: KickAssembler 3rd party Java plugins - test project setup, registering plugins .plugin directive, macro plugins IEngine IValue ISourceRange IMemoryBlock IParameterMap interfaces, modifier plugins, segment modifier plugins, disk writer plugins, archive plugins, auto-include file plugins

splits.name: kickass_quick_reference
splits.description: KickAssembler quick reference appendix - complete command line options list, preprocessor directives summary, standard 6502 mnemonics opcode table with hex values and addressing modes, illegal 6502 mnemonics opcodes, DTV instruction set, 65c02 mnemonics opcodes, assembler directives complete list with syntax, value types number string boolean list hashtable vector matrix

splits.name: kickass_technical_details
splits.description: KickAssembler technical details - flexible parse algorithm multi-pass assembling, recording of side effects for pass optimization, function mode vs asm mode execution, invalid value calculations and propagation
